verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Who am I that You are mindful of me,
That You hear me when I call?
Is it true that You are thinking of me,
How You love me?
It's amazing.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I am a friend of God.
I am a friend of God.
I am a friend of God;
He calls me friend.

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
God Almighty,
Lord of Glory,
You have called me friend. (3X)

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
I am a friend of God.
I am a friend of God.
I am a friend of God;
You call me friend.
